subject: Football
lead_paragraph: In a video edition of Leading Off, Jets Coach Rex Ryan visits Pamplona; a Browns fan has the final word; and the Yankees have an on-again, off-again relationship with their tarp.
snippet: In a video edition of Leading Off, Jets Coach Rex Ryan visits Pamplona; a Browns fan has the final word; and the Yankees have an on-again, off-again relationship with their tarp.
